listing.listing_description:
_ Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact us. _

Nestled in the quiet hillside of Deve, this brand new home overlooks the ocean and Toiny Bay and is one of our most stylish St. Barts vacation rentals. You will fall in love with the unspoiled tropical island of St Barts with its relaxed atmosphere and abundance of beautiful sandy beaches. It’s also home to excellent boutique shopping and some of the Caribbean’s finest restaurants.

The modern back patio offers plenty of spots to soak in some rays—whether you choose one of the cushioned lounge chairs or double-sized sunbeds. They surround the infinity-edge pool that spans the length of the deck and lights up for nighttime swims. Fire up the barbecue for an alfresco meal and serve it on the outdoor dining table that has seating for eight. A daily housekeeping service (except for Sundays and holidays) is an added bonus.

From the patio, you can step into the villa’s open-concept living room. This space is stylish with modern furnishings, chic wallpaper (including an image of a pink dog) and funky light fixtures. It flows into the sleek, well-equipped kitchen, where you’ll find all the appliances you need to craft an island-inspired meal. There’s also offers an espresso machine for early morning caffeine fixes.

The villa’s four air-conditioned bedrooms can accommodate up to eight guests (children of all ages are welcome here), and each suite includes a queen-sized bed, en-suite bathroom with a shower and a television with a DVD player. Three bedrooms feature ocean views, and two are located in separate bungalows (one is more suitable for staff members or teenagers).

When you’re ready for some surf and sand, the nearest beach is Lorient—a reef-protected spot with calm waters that are perfect for swimming. You’ll find diverse restaurants, boutiques and gift shops in the island’s capital, Gustavia, 8.1 km from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
From its lofty perch on a verdant hillside, Vue de Rêves offers perhaps the most sublime ocean vistas on St. Barts. Redesigned in 2017 by a prominent French architect, the spectacular villa has hosted celebrity guests including the Kennedy family and singer Mariah Carey, a testament to its dream-like prospects, top-shelf amenities, and prime location within minutes of Gustavia, St.-Jean Bay, and enchanting beaches. Gourmet chefs will be inspired here, with an outdoor pizza oven and a superb French kitchen endowed with a La Cornue oven and range. Five superb king bedroom suites offer ideal accommodations for multiple couples, family reunions, and destination wedding guests.

The villa blends the natural elements into a quintessential experience of this island paradise, with an infinite swimming pool and blazing fire pit harmonizing with the sweeping views of Eden Rock, Nikki Beach, and the Caribbean Sea. Enjoy peaceful days on the terrace, bathing in the crystalline water and basking on elegant lounge chairs and sunbeds. Relish an alfresco meal in the afternoon and relax in the breeze-swayed hammock. Savor delicious cocktails by the fire as the sunset yields to a vast canopy of stars.

Ample pocket doors infuse the home with a plein-air ambiance. The fabulous kitchen features generous prep space and easily serves the villa's lounge and dining areas, as well as a lovely bar. The salon includes a large, flat-screen TV and sumptuous sofa, and the interior dining table is set beside the glass display-wall of a magnificent wine tasting room. Beautiful vaulted ceilings with pendant lighting form a luminous haven for nighttime gatherings. There is an office space if needed, and a private gym for workouts before a morning plunge.

All five suites feature king beds, ensuite bathrooms, and truly gorgeous views. Four of the suites open to the pool terrace or balconies. The master additionally includes a walk-in closet and lovely alfresco shower. Air conditioning and ceiling fans ensure a comfortable atmosphere at all times.

There is hardly a finer location on Saint Barthelemy for balancing privileged privacy with convenience. You're within minutes by car of Gustavia, St. Jean Bay, and several exquisite beaches, while the international airport is just two kilometers from your door.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Treat yourself to one of the best vacation rentals on one of the world’s best beaches at Casa Grande. Set on the north shore of Providenciales, this one-of-a-kind villa is right on the powdery sands of top-ranked Grace Bay Beach, a quick paddle from excellent snorkeling, and minutes from dining, shopping and nightlife. Its charming Spanish Colonial–inspired interiors were recently remodeled, and five spacious bedrooms can accommodate up to ten friends or family members on a sunny getaway.

Casa Grande sits amid lush landscaping on a private one-acre oceanfront lot. But there’s plenty to love besides the location, from the provided beach equipment, including kayaks, stand-up paddleboards and snorkel gear, to the outdoor living and dining areas facing the infinity pool, plunge pool and, of course, the ocean. Whip up refreshments to sip in the hammock in the margarita machine, heat up the barbecue to prepare local seafood and end the evening with a little stargazing from the rooftop terrace.

Though this luxury home takes its inspiration from traditional architecture, it was recently given a refresh and expansion for a state-of-the-art look and feel. Fold-away walls let you open the indoor living areas to the terrace for one seamless indoor-outdoor living space with tantalizing ocean views through the archways. The open-plan living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen encourage guests to mingle, and the kitchen’s breakfast bar will prompt diners to stay and chat with the cook.

Casa Grande has four bedrooms with king beds and lounge areas, including the master suite; two of them have en-suite bathrooms and two share a hall bathroom. The fifth bedroom has two twin beds and an en-suite bathroom. In a decadent tropical touch, all five bedrooms have al-fresco showers and open to a terrace or balcony.

With its famously soft sand, gorgeous turquoise water and laid-back lifestyle, Turks and Caicos is just as wonderful for a family holiday as it is for an escape with friends or relaxed honeymoon. Though Casa Grande is close to shopping and dining on Grace Bay, the tennis club and golf course, and the marina, it’s also right on 12 miles of what is perhaps the island’s best beach—so you may not want to leave.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa La Percha is a luxurious, ocean-front villa located in the prestigious Ocean Point development on the island of Providenciales. Situated on a promontory between beautiful Taylor Bay and Sapodilla Bay the home offers turquoise blue ocean vistas from every room. The constant sea breeze provides a perfect environment in which to relax, unwind and enjoy the beauty of this Caribbean villa

With 4 bedrooms and 4.5 baths the villa is ideal for several couples to share, or for a perfect family vacation. Three minutes along a quiet footpath will bring you to Taylor Bay, one of the island’s best-kept secrets. This soft white sand beach is calm, sheltered and shallow, making it ideal for children or just relaxing with a good book and an amazing view! For those with a little more energy there are also tennis courts available for your pleasure across the road from the villa and adjacent to the beach.

listing.listing_description:
Swim in the gentle waters of the Caicos Banks from this beachfront villa on Providenciales. Perched on the southern shore of Turtle Tail, the villa enjoys edge-of-the-world vistas and direct access to some of the most secluded and pristine sands in Turks and Caicos. Explore nearby cays by kayak or paddleboard, or drive minutes to the fairways of Provo Golf Club.

The 3,200-square-foot villa is built at a slight elevation above the white-sand beach. An illuminated walkway leads down to the soft sand, where a wooden sundeck is perched beside the lapping surf, and shallow, swimmer-friendly waters extend to the horizon. The ample pool terrace welcomes refreshing dips and long hours under the sun, while a generous veranda provides cool shade for afternoon drinks, barbecue grilling, and alfresco meals.

A vanishing wall creates a breezy entry into the cool, spacious interior, where the open-concept layout includes an ample TV lounge, a second dining table, and a chef-grade kitchen with breakfast bar. The design and décor offer a modern take on the classic Caribbean beach cottage, with a stylish minimalism that both emphasizes and enhances the island's profound natural beauty.

All 4 of the villa's bedrooms feature king beds and ensuite bathrooms, and all open to a balcony or terrace with ocean views. These accommodations are ideal for multiple couples, families, destination wedding guests, or business retreats.

From the secluded haven of Turtle Tail, you're an easy drive to the beach and bustling nightlife scene of Grace Bay, the marina at Turtle Cove, and the famous Thursday Fish Fry at the Bight Park. But you may never want to leave this private paradise: the beach itself is one of the most serene on the island, and the Caicos Banks offer serene waters for wading, swimming, and kayak adventures.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located near Soufriere’s Anse Chastanet beach, La Bagatelle is perfect for those who appreciate lovely natural surroundings and refined touches. Lush green gardens surround this beautiful two-storey villa, while colorful bougainvillea, poinsettias, vincas, and thunbergia climb and hang from all parts of the home. The famous Pitons are in plain sight as is the tranquil blue water of the Caribbean.

Start each day sipping a coffee in a wicker chair on the upstairs porch, watching fishing boats sail off. As the sun warms, head down to the clay-tiled pool terrace and bask in a cozy chaise longue, then cool off with an invigorating plunge. Sizzle up fresh seafood on the outdoor grill and enjoy it all fresco. A hammock and four-poster day bed are perfect escapes from the mid-afternoon heat. At dusk gather your guests around the outdoor lounge set and observe a stunning St. Lucia sunset.

The spacious living room is furnished with soft settees, upholstered with designer fabrics and large cushions. Gentle breezes circulate freely courtesy of louver windows and doors. The same smooth greenheart wood which makes up the upper balcony also lines the interior floors. A fully-equipped kitchen will inspire you to create something special for your guests. Enjoy the fruits of your labor around an elegant dining table.

Both of La Bagatelle’s bedrooms are found downstairs. The Master suite has a West Indian King size four-poster bed, antique wood furnishings and a stylish en-suite bathroom with Italian tiled shower. The second bedroom houses two additional four-poster beds: Double and Queen size. It also features antique furniture, plus an en-suite bathroom with double sinks. Ceiling fans cool both rooms.

You’re free to use a tennis court located below the house. Anse Chastanet beach is a five minute drive and has diving facilities and a protected marine park for snorkeling. Soufriere is close to St. Lucia’s most spectacular natural features: Pitons, Sulphur Springs, botanical gardens, and hidden waterfalls. Shops and restaurants can be found in town, though serious shoppers may opt for a daytrip to Rodney Bay.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy a blissful visit to some of the world’s best beaches at Villa Sunset Close. Follow the winding road past the bluffs and bright blue waters of Chalk Sound to the exclusive Silly Creek neighborhood, where this gorgeous Turks and Caicos vacation rental sits on a private beach. Though the area is actually named for a 20th-century entrepreneur, the villa’s resort-worthy amenities and the island’s white-sand shores may make you wonder if your head’s been turned.

The waterfront pool, shaded terrace with lounge chairs and separate deck are the perfect spots to stretch out with friends or family. Stroll into the warm water from your very own beach, or take the two-person kayaks or stand-up paddleboards on an expedition up Silly Creek. For dinner, nothing tastes better than local seafood, prepared on the barbecue and eaten al-fresco at the table overlooking the water. End the evening around the firepit or with a soak in the hot tub.

Bright, sophisticated interiors lend Villa Sunset Close a feel of modern luxury. Double-height ceilings in the open-plan living room offer views of sea and sky, and vibrant red-tinged artwork sets off the cool white sofa and accent pieces. Step into the adjacent kitchen for a snack or cocktail at the bar, or to prep a favorite meal using the fully equipped space.

The villa’s four dreamy bedrooms feature details like four-poster beds and ocean-inspired color schemes of deep blue and complementary coral red. There are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms; one opens to a terrace and the other to a balcony. The third bedroom has a king bed and the fourth has two extra-long twin beds (converted into a king bed on request), and share a bathroom, making them the perfect arrangement for parents on holiday with children.

World-class beaches, balmy weather and a laid-back lifestyle make Turks and Caicos popular for relaxed honeymoons, idyllic destination weddings or golf getaways where every fairway looks straight off a postcard. Whether you’re on Providenciales to celebrate a special occasion or escape the everyday, Villa Sunset Close puts you just a short drive from shopping and dining, the natural wonders of Princess Alexandra National Park, the eighteen holes of Provo Golf Club and, of course, plenty of incredible palm-dotted scenery.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find serenity in the incredible views of mountains and sea from Beaches Edge East. This gorgeous Blowing Point vacation rental is a private oceanfront estate perfectly situated near the water’s edge, local restaurants, golf and more. Book the property on its own for a tranquil escape, or with its sister villa, Beaches Edge West, to host a family reunion or intimate Anguilla destination wedding.

Take in the panoramas across the water to the neighboring island of St. Martin from the villa’s stone terrace, where you’ll find plenty of loungers, a pool and a hot tub. A barbecue and shaded al-fresco dining area make it easy to try out fresh local seafood. After a day on the beach or the golf course, share photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi or serve refreshments from the wine fridge and put on the sound system.

Sleek contemporary architecture and walls of windows frame the views from the expansive open-plan great room, blurring the lines between indoors and out. Watch the sea from one of two sitting areas or a formal dining area that seats eight. Even the fully equipped kitchen echoes the colors of the ocean in its sleek white cabinetry and turquoise backsplash and breakfast bar.

The villa’s five bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms and lounge areas, can accommodate up to ten guests in island luxury. There are two master bedrooms that rival any honeymoon suite, with king beds and private balconies overlooking the ocean, as well as a third king bedroom. The other two bedrooms have queen beds.

Known for its stunning beaches—and lack of mega-resorts—Anguilla is an ideal Caribbean destination for those seeking a tranquil escape. Beaches Edge East makes it easy to bliss out, with a location just steps from a secluded beach area and a short drive from the island’s world-class West End beaches. You’ll also find plenty of restaurant choices and the Cuisinart Resort golf course close by.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Tropical sunshine, glimmering water and lush greenery play off each other at Cayuco 9. This Dominican Republic vacation rental is close to the beach in sunny, exclusive Cap Cana and set along the fairways of one of the Caribbean’s best golf courses. Beautiful water features wind their way through the open living spaces of this luxury home to a resort-worthy outdoor entertaining area.

Your stay at Cayuco 9 begins with a transfer from Punta Cana’s international airport to the villa, where you’ll be welcomed by a fruit basket and a private check-in. A housekeeper and butler will be on hand during your holiday to see to your needs. You’ll want to spend most of your time in the outdoor entertaining area, which features a pool with a swim-up wet bar, a hot tub, a barbecue and lounging and dining areas both shaded and sunny.

Inspired by the traditional aesthetic of the tropics, the open-air living and dining pavilions have soaring thatched roofs and polished stone floors. A built-in sectional and wicker sofas have room for the whole family, as does a dining area that seats ten. Inside the house, a cozy media room adjoins a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and practical island layout.

All six bedrooms at Cayuco 9 have en-suite bathrooms and open to either a terrace or balcony; several also have al-fresco showers or bathtubs for a honeymoon-suite feel. There are two bedrooms with king beds, three with two queen beds each, and one room with two twin-over-full bunk beds that’s perfect for kids.

Explore the planned community of Cap Cana on the villa’s bicycle or take the golf cart to the tennis courts, clubhouse or Punta Espada Golf Club—ranked as one of the top courses in the Caribbean. Make the short drive to Caleton Beach Club or Juanillo Beach for a stroll on the sugary sand, or depart from the nearby marina on a fishing expedition.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to a palm-fringed private haven at Limones 39. Nestled into a lush lot at Casa de Campo, this Dominican Republic vacation rental is a hideaway within the grounds of one of the Caribbean’s most exclusive resorts—yet close enough to the beach and golf course to make it easy to take advantage. Its four bedrooms can host up to ten friends and family members in true tropical luxury.

Your Casa de Campo holiday begins with a transfer from the airport and includes daily housekeeping service. Spend lazy days soaking up the sun in loungers by the swimming pool or serving lunch from the barbecue at the al-fresco dining area, followed by low-key nights in the outdoor Jacuzzi or inside around the satellite TV, Wi-Fi and wet bar.

Caribbean elegance is on display in the villa’s polished marble floors, wood paneling and refined furnishings. Sliding glass doors connect the outdoor living areas with the open-concept living and dining room, where crisp white walls and sofas are set off by sea-inspired accents of blue and green. The separate kitchen is fully equipped but equally stylish, with gorgeous stone countertops and backsplash.

Limones 39 has one master bedroom with a king bed and three bedrooms with two full beds each; all four have en-suite bathrooms. For larger parties, a sofa bed in the media room can provide extra accommodations if needed.

While the villa feels like your own piece of paradise, it’s just over a quarter-mile from the powdery sands and turquoise waters of Minitas Beach, where you can snorkel, kayak, sunbathe or relive your honeymoon with a hand-in-hand stroll. The villa is also a short drive from renowned courses such as Teeth of the Dog and Dye Fore, where avid golfers won’t want to miss the chance to play.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Make lasting memories in the Negril sunshine at Idle Awhile Villas' Cottonwood Villa. Perched on the edge of the sands of Seven Mile Beach, with fantastic sunset views, this incredible Jamaica vacation rental is perfect for a family reunion or getaway with friends. Five bedrooms, 5,500 square feet of living space and a full staff let you host up to ten guests in island luxury.

Your holiday at Cottonwood Villa includes the services of a chef, butler and housekeeper; the use of water sports equipment such as kayaks and sailboats; and, for guests over 18, access to the fitness center at the Couples Swept Away resort. If you’d prefer to relax in private, the villa has several inviting outdoor living areas, from a pool surrounded by lounge chairs and a row of hammocks to a shaded al-fresco dining gazebo where you can watch the sunset.

Beamed ceilings, tiled floors and wood-framed windows create a relaxed escape from everyday life. With a wide, lemon-hued sectional, a wet bar and double doors leading to the terrace, the open-plan living room is wonderful for gathering with the whole group or settling in with a book. Though chef service is part of your stay, the villa does have a fully equipped kitchen with both a breakfast bar and a breakfast nook.

Each of the five bedrooms at Cottonwood Villa could rival a honeymoon suite, with their king beds, en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas and private terraces. There are three suites with ocean views and two with garden views, but all five exude tropical elegance in their traditional furnishings, vaulted ceilings and jaunty striped accent pillows.

With the sugary sands of Seven Mile Beach practically at your doorstep, it’s easy to enjoy the clear, calm waters. For souvenir shopping, a taste of local specialties or an evening out, make the 5-minute walk to the nearest downtown area. The short drive to Orange Bay rewards visitors with even more beautiful beaches, while the trip to—and plunge into—Blue Hole Mineral Spring is a uniquely Jamaican experience.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find all the elements of a spectacular beach holiday at Sand Villa. Not only is this Anguilla vacation rental named for the postcard-perfect stretch of Long Bay Beach, which lies just in front of the residence, it offers private beach access and ocean views from nearly every room. Reserve this luxury property for a Caribbean getaway with friends, a milestone celebration with family or even an intimate destination wedding in the tropics.

Your stay at Sand Villa includes a daily continental breakfast, as well as the services of a housekeeper, butler, manager and on-site concierge. Watch the waves lap at the shore from outdoor living areas with a heated pool, hot tub, spaces for sitting and dining, and a barbecue. Guests are also welcome to use the floodlit tennis courts, exercise room and beach cabana shared with the villa’s two sister properties.

Crisp and elegant, the villa’s open-concept interiors are perfect for relaxing or entertaining. The airy living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen all face the ocean, and are connected to the rest of the house by a series of graceful archways.

Each of the four bedrooms at Sand Villa is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and ocean-view balcony. Two of the bedrooms even have al-fresco showers. If you’re traveling with kids, let them bunk together in a fifth bedroom with two twin bunk beds.

A stay at Sand Villa puts you just steps—quite literally—from the white sands and turquoise waters of Long Bay Beach. (This does mean, however, that guests with reduced mobility may find the beach difficult to access.) It’s also just a short drive from the island’s renowned Greg Norman golf course, several nearby resorts with golf and spas, and shopping and dining in The Valley, the capital of Anguilla.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Enjoy a little extra peace of mind while you’re staying steps away from the beach at Miami’s first luxury eco-hotel. Sustainable and serene, you’ll feel right at home reading on the balcony and sipping coffee at the breakfast bar. Then, venture out for a day of shopping and dining along Lincoln.

Simple and elegant, this cream-toned suite is sure to set a relaxing mood when you’re not out on the beach. The natural wood coffee table and environmental decor convey the hotel’s dedication to eco-friendly design, and beach photography reminds you of the beauty beyond its walls. The sunbed on the balcony is a perfect place to curl up with someone special or take an afternoon nap. 

Book yourself an appointment at the onsite 5-star spa, with a variety of treatment therapies, a sauna, and steam room. Then, cool off in one of 4 outdoor swimming pools, including South Beach’s largest rooftop swimming pool. The pool center on the roof also has a restaurant, serving Peruvian-inspired Japanese cuisine.

Shopping in Miami is a must if you like being up to date on the latest trends. Mary Brickell Village and Lincoln Road Mall are both nearby pedestrian malls lined with all the best designer boutiques. After the mall, wander Miami’s Design District and enjoy the iconic architecture of the city. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Fall in love all over again at BelAmour. Envisioned as an intimate hideaway on the coast near Pointe Milou, this St. Barts luxury residence was designed to pamper just the two of you with its ocean views and sophisticated interiors. It’s the perfect place to rekindle a romance or escape for a honeymoon in the sun.

The villa’s cliffside perch commands views across the Caribbean Sea to the islets of Bonhomme, Fregate and Toc Vert–and even to neighboring St. Maarten and Anguilla on the clearest days. See what you can spot from outdoor living spaces with an infinity pool, barbecue, and lounging and dining areas. In the evenings, relax in front of the Apple TV or check in with friends and family at home over Wi-Fi.

A slide-away glass wall is all that separates the villa’s great room from the terrace and the sea views. But the vistas are just as gorgeous inside, thanks to a wall-to-wall piece by French artist Jean-Charles de Castelbajac. Stretch out in the open-concept living and dining areas and, when you need to eat, whip up something delicious in the adjacent fully equipped kitchen.

The single bedroom at BelAmour has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and ocean views. Like the rest of this vacation rental, it’s designed to envelop you in luxe textures and statement-making pieces, starting with a bed imported from Bali and continuing with designer fabrics.

While you could spend your holiday simply enjoying each other’s company in your private retreat, it’s easy to explore the island. The villa’s location puts you less than a 10-minute drive from Lorient and Grand Cul de Sac beaches. Try a new water sport or have a drink with the jet set in St. Jean, or find more shopping and dining choices in charming Gustavia.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched above the sugar-white sands of Long Bay Beach, this incredibly scenic five bedroom captures endless views of turquoise sea surrounding the Caribbean island of Anguilla. Each of Sea Villa’s bedrooms comes outfitted with a king-sized bed, lavish en-suite bathroom, and an amazing ocean view. Just steps down from Sea Villa’s gorgeous terrace, you’ll enjoy a quick walk through lush Caribbean greenery, leading to the secluded shores of Long Bay Beach. Nearby, you’ll find restaruants, luxury resorts, scenic golf courses, and plenty more incredible beachfront areas along the coast of Anguilla.

White-washed walls act as a canvas for the bright blues and greens of Anguilla’s beautiful environment, which is further accentuated indoors thanks to the wide openings that stretch along the ocean-facing walls. Stately furniture decorates Sea Villa’s open concept interior, adding a touch of elegance to the soothing Caribbean atmosphere. Outside, you’ll love cooling off in the swimming pool, dining alfresco, and rejuvenating in the hot tub. At dinner, there’s formal dining space inside for ten, a fully equipped kitchen, and there’s a gas barbeque on the terrace as well.

Sea Villa comes with shared access to the Beach Bar Clubhouse, tennis courts, beach barbeques, and an exersice room. The property is located within a gated community with twenty-four-hour security, daily breakfast, housekeeping, and a butler service. Indoor features include Wi-Fi, Smart television, air conditioning, a Sonos sound system, and a washer/dryer.

After you’ve spent a day or two soaking up the sun and surf of Long Bay Beach, venture on to discover some of Anguilla’s other popular beachfront areas, just a few kilometers away on the shores of Sandy Ground and Shoal Bay. To visit with some of Anguilla’s neighboring islands, head to Blowing Point Ferry. If there’s a golf aficianado in the group, CuisinArt Golf Resort is the best course on the island. And, as a reward, check-in to their refreshing spa facility. Anything else you may need can be found nearby in The Valley, including plenty of dining, shopping, and nightlife options.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With a private gated-beachfront along the coast of Grand Cayman’s, East End, Villa Stepping Stone is a four-bedroom luxury villa that is equipped more like a boutique resort. The private dock comes equipped with water sports equipment, and there’s plenty of beach furniture and an alfresco shower outside, making your beach access quick, easy, and completely hassle-free.

Inside, you’ll instantly fall in love with Stepping Stone’s rich wood tones on the parquet flooring and exposed beams of the vaulted ceiling. Mixing in splashes of marble and granite further display Stepping Stone’s appreciation of fine natural craftsmanship. In the main floor common area, windowed doors open across the entire ocean-facing wall, ensuring the free flow of fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight. The living area, billiards lounge, dining room, and master bedroom all open to a patch of vibrant green lawn, just before the pool deck begins. The area is furnished with an “L” shaped couch, coffee table, and decorated with lush palm trees, making it a beautiful extension of the interior living space.

Outside, there are living, dining, and lounge areas surrounding the pool. There’s also an outdoor kitchen with a grill, great for preparing something fresh from a local market. Back inside, features like air conditioning, Wi-Fi, satellite television will keep you cool and connected. There’s also a home theatre and an office area, which are great spaces to find extra privacy if needed.

Nearby, there’s restaurants, a grocery store, and Watersport activities and excursions available in East End, about three-kilometers from Stepping Stone. If you feel like learning a little more about the local flora and fauna, Blue Iguana Nature Reserve is also just a short drive from home. And, on the other side of the Island, which is still only forty-minutes by car, you’ll find George Town’s shopping, dining, and nightlife.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
From its hillside perch, Villa Lina captures picturesque views of lush coastal greenery and an endless ocean view. Lina’s three-bedroom interior is spacious enough a family or group of friends on vacation together, and its scenic terrace is private enough for a romantic honeymoon. And, although private, Lina is located quite close to the city of Gustavia, and several of St. Bart’s most famously beautiful beachfront areas.

Lina’s interior is incredibly spacious, a feature that is punctuated by its vaulted ceilings and numerous openings to the terrace and garden. In fact, the living room and terrace merge so seamlessly; they function more like one large open-air common area. The decor is elegant, yet playful, with modern designer furniture and bright accent pieces. Rich wood textures and local flora will remind you of St. Bart’s natural surroundings, while high-end electronics and eclectic works of art add a modern-luxurious touch.

Outside, the ocean-view terrace is ready to show you the best of the St. Bart’s lifestyle. With an endless sea vista, swimming pool, sun loungers, and outdoor living area, you’ll have plenty of comfortable vantage points. There’s also an alfresco shower and gas barbecue on the terrace. Back inside, Wi-Fi, HD television, and a sound system will help set the mood for unforgettable evenings and keep guests entertained and connected.

Just a few minutes away in Gustavia, you’ll have plenty of great dining and nightlife options for a romantic evening in town. There’s also boutique shops, the marina, and several adventure tourism opportunities. When it’s time to visit one St. Bart’s world famous beaches, start with St. Jean’s Beach. Easily the island most popular, St. Jean’s is lined with beachfront bars and restaurants, and luxury hotels. For a more remote getaway, Gouverneur Beach is usually less busy, and its calm, clear waters are ideal for snorkeling.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Organize that family reunion, destination wedding, or any other event that benefits from a little extra space, at this regal Caribbean villa on St. James. Make that special announcement over dinner at the alfresco set. Gather the group on the spacious lawn for a backyard barbecue. When you’ve got time to sneak away, shoot a round at Royal Westmoreland Golf Course or hit Reeds Bay Beach.

Outlined in lush gardens, this gated estate offers the utmost privacy for your special occasion. Follow elegant marble walkways through arched doors to discover Bajan Height’s stately interior. Decorated in pristine white, with ocean-inspired accents, this vacation home is the perfect contrast to the vibrant greenery of Barbados. After the private chef has prepared dinner, gather in the formal dining room. After, sip cocktails at the media room’s wet bar or move the party outside to the multi-level terrace and pool. When you get a chance to escape with that special someone, take a bottle of wine out to the garden gazebo at the end of the lawn to watch the sunset.

On the Royal Westmoreland estate, you’ll have access to their golf course, clubhouse, and state of the art gym. Five kilometers beyond the estate, you’ll find the home of the Harrison Caves and Mount Gay Rum Distillery, Holetown. If you’re in town for the evening, do a little bar hopping, you’ll find everything from beachfront frozen drinks to classic cocktail lounges along the oceanside streets of Holetown.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The estate of Villa Turquesa is a fusion of luxury and casual living, nestled on the west coast of Providenciales within Sapodilla Bay’s coveted Ocean Point Drive Community. Masterfully crafted with Colonial Barbadian architecture pervading throughout, this 4,750 sq. ft. 4 bedroom, 4.5 bathroom residence sits elevated above the turquoise waters and boasts magnificent views.

Villa Turquesa brings the best of the Caribbean right to its doorstep. With sweeping views of Sapodilla Bay and a host of amenities, this luxurious residence has all the essentials for relaxing and rejuvenating. Enjoy the soft white sands and tranquil waters of Taylor Bay Beach, or take a dip in the private pool. At day’s end, entertain friends and family on the private waterfront deck.

The classic design of this estate affords breathtaking views from every room. The upper floor master suite boasts custom tray-style tongue and grove ceilings, fine furnishings and wood floors. The large, airy living and dining spaces with vaulted ceilings are capable of hosting formal occasions, but are just as enjoyable for intimate family living. Another interior highlight is the state-of-the-art professional grade kitchen, complimented with custom handcrafted trim cabinetry and doors.

The gentle whitewashed Barbadian coral stone exterior, carriage car park and storage space seamlessly blends with magnificently landscaped grounds, defining a Caribbean residential masterpiece.

listing.listing_description:
Located on the waterfront of Simpson Bay Lagoon in beautiful St. Martin, villa Amarylis is the perfect setting to make your Caribbean vacation dreams come true. Situated within a gated community, just minutes from the island’s most popular nightlife spots, you’ll have no trouble enjoying the lagoon’s peaceful, secluded atmosphere, even with such great proximity to Maho. Within a few minutes drive, you’ll find golf, beachfront, and nightlife.

When the view is this good, you’ll want to make sure nothing gets in the way, and that’s exactly how Amarylis is laid out. From the swimming pool to the living room couch, you’ll have incredible views of Simpson’s Bay Lagoon. The white-washed color scheme and stately decor create an atmosphere that is both relaxing, and elegant, making Amarylis the perfect host for any occasion.

Amarylis is outfitted with top of the line tech features, including a Smart television, integrated sound system, and Wi-Fi. The fully equipped kitchen, backyard barbeque, and formal and alfresco dining areas make it easy to host special family dinners. When it’s time to retire for the evening, you’ll have four lagoon-view bedrooms with queen beds, ensuites, and access to the terrace, as well as a private entrance kids room with queen bed and ensuite.

Feel like exploring the lagoon? Consider a snorkeling or scuba diving tour, or better yet, rent a boat and create your own tour. Villa Amarylis comes with a private dock, so popping in for a swim, and renting or chartering a boat is a breeze. If there’s a golfer in the crew, Mullett Bay Golf Course is six minutes from home. For a day on the beach, a night of dancing, or a trip to the casino, Maho Beach is where you’ll find the island’s most exciting nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Welcome to Hacienda 82, a tropical luxury villa that takes the concept of seamless indoor/outdoor living to the next level. Surrounded by golf courses and green meadows, this magical spot in paradise rests amid high palms, while further mellowed by the enchanting songs of local birds. Just a fifteen minute walk from La Cana Beach – sun, sand, golf and scuba diving will be right at your fingertips in the beauty of the Dominican Republic.

Step down a set of palatial steps directly into the pristine waters of the private infinity swimming pool. The terrace includes plenty of cushioned rattan seating and ceiling fans for cool tropical living. A barbeque sets the tone for some lovely alfresco dining. Indoors, you will find a home entertainment system and Wi-Fi. As part of the gated community of Punta Cana Resort & Club, guests of Hacienda 82 will enjoy complimentary access to the tennis courts, the beach & golf club and the Six Senses Spa. Your reservation includes daily housekeeping and a welcome fruit basket. Take a load off!

The interior living and dining areas are fresh and funky, with splashes of color reminiscent of the lush natural environment that surrounds Hacienda 82. The fully equipped kitchen features plenty of counter space, stainless steel appliances and gas hobs. Large folding doors provide direct access to the outdoors and pool area.

The four exquisite bedrooms at Hacienda 82 accommodate up to ten fortunate guests. The villa is non-smoking, and children are most welcome. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms, flat screen televisions, air conditioning and ceiling fans. All suites also provide direct access to the outdoors – three suites to balconies and the fourth to a terrace.

During your stay at Hacienda 82, you will be within easy driving distance of Ojos Indigenas Ecological Park as well as the Corales Golf Course. Of course, you have come to the Dominican Republic to relax, so why not ask our dedicated concierge about the additional chef, babysitter and massage options? Other nearby activities you might want to check out include fishing, swimming with the dolphins, whale watching and reef exploring. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!

Villa Iris is located on the heights of Grand Cul de Sac in fabulous St. Barts with oceanfront views of Petit Cul de Sac Bay and the adjacent lagoon. The layout of this contemporary vacation rental has been organized so you can enjoy lush hillside and ocean views from every room. St. Barts has earned its reputation for being luxurious and exclusive. The beaches are secluded, the water is warm and the landscape is composed of beautiful hills and ravines. Live it up with Luxury Retreats!

Outside, the beautiful infinity-edge swimming pool is perfect for having a splash or doing some laps. The deck features plenty of sun loungers, a lounge and a barbeque. Inside, you will find a television and Wi-Fi. The stylish bar makes entertaining a cinch. Your reservation includes housekeeping.

The interiors of this private holiday home are ultra-modern, yet plush and comfortable. Underneath high vaulted ceilings that provide a quintessential Caribbean air, you will find a living room with cozy white couches and a contoured kitchen area with a cooking “bubble.” A large opening spanning the length of the room leads right out to the deck and the stunning view of the sea and islands.

Two exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to four guests at this non-smoking villa. Both bedrooms offer king size beds, en-suite bathrooms, televisions and direct access to the terrace. We recommend this villa for a small family, a couples’ retreat or a honeymoon in the sun. Speak to our concierge about booking this wonderful site as the backdrop for a special celebration such as a wedding or anniversary.

With a distinct French influence, St. Barts is sophisticated and laid back. Within minutes from Villa Iris, you will be able to access three fabulous beaches: Grand Cul de Sac, Marigot Beach and Petit Cul de Sac. In nearby Gustavia, St. Bart’s tiny and relaxed capital city, you will discover red roofed buildings that pop through the lush tropical landscape, and all the historical sites can be seen over a day of walking around town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find ocean views, a pristine stretch of beach and ample room to relax at the perfectly named Sweet Spot. Set on the golden sands of Runaway Bay, this fully staffed Jamaica vacation rental is a wonderful setting for a beach holiday with the whole family or a Caribbean getaway with friends.

Spend your days savoring the warm breezes and panoramic views from beachfront living areas with a pool, wet bar, charcoal barbecue, hammock and a shaded veranda. Take the snorkeling equipment and kayaks out into the ocean, or challenge other guests on the al-fresco ping-pong table and volleyball court. Other amenities include an air-conditioned exercise room, Wi-Fi that extends to the pool area and cable television. Your stay also includes the services of a cook, butler and housekeeper.

Traditional architecture and vibrant colors give this 6,000-square-foot luxury property a bold yet inviting appeal. A series of arched doorways leads from the veranda to the living and dining rooms, where hues of orange and blue and beach-inspired artwork lend a lively feel. Multiple sitting areas in the main living room, as well as a separate family room with a television, ensure that there’s room for everyone to socialize or stretch out and read.

Sweet Spot has five bedrooms with king beds, four of which have ocean views and balcony access, and one bedroom with two double beds. All six bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and a refined look thanks to carefully selected classic furnishings.

While it’s easy to fill a stay with swims in the ocean and honeymoon-style strolls on the beach in front of the villa, there’s plenty more to see in the area. Sweet Spot is just a 3-minute drive from the nearest seafood restaurant, a 10-minute drive from an equestrian center and 15 minutes by car from Cranbrook Flower Park. Make the 20-minute drive to either the tranquil ambience of the spa or the bustling eateries and activity centers in Ocho Rios.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Let turquoise waters and sunny skies inspire the holiday you’ve always imagined at Dream Big Villa. Set on the postcard-perfect shores of Sapodilla Bay, this Turks and Caicos vacation rental puts the island’s world-class beaches at your doorstep. Contemporary design, eight bedrooms and an attentive staff give you the luxury of a resort in the comfortable ambience of a private residence.

Your stay begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a live-in manager, housekeeper and security guard. Make the most of the Caribbean weather in outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, tennis and half-basketball courts, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue, or take the provided kayaks, paddleboards and bicycles out to explore. Or enjoy the villa’s exercise and games rooms, home theater and wet bar.

Designed as a family getaway, Dream Big Villa has more than 15,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor living space. They’re seamlessly connected by glass walls that can be slid open to let the warm breezes waft over the living and dining rooms. Sophisticated beach-house-inspired furnishings make for an inviting feel throughout, and the fully equipped kitchen has an equally welcoming breakfast bar.

The villa has four bedrooms with king beds, two bedrooms with queen beds, one bedroom with two twin beds and one bunk room with three twin bunk beds. All eight bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and several have their own entrances, making them ideal for couples wanting a honeymoon-worthy haven.

Though Dream Big Villa is beachfront to Sapodilla Bay at low tide, it’s well worth making the short drive to scope out the sand at nearby Taylor Bay, Babalua Beach and world-famous Grace Bay. If you’re an avid player, you won’t want to miss the chance to tee off in a spectacular setting at Provo Golf Club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
It doesn’t get much better than sitting in the pool and looking down at the Bay of St. Jean from Bastide on St. Barts. This brand-new luxury villa in Lurin is just a few minutes’ drive from charming Gustavia but feels miles away thanks to a setting on a private hilltop lot with views down to the sea. Open-plan interiors and three bedrooms can easily welcome a group of friends and family or become a romantic backdrop for a lavish Caribbean honeymoon.

You’ve come to the island to enjoy the balmy weather, so slide open the villa’s glass doors and start your day with breakfast at the covered al-fresco dining area or the shaded lounge area. Bring a book and cold drink to a lounge chair on the sunny deck, or move the chairs into the shallow end of the infinity pool. Ease into the evening by tossing local seafood on the barbecue and passing out drinks from the outdoor bar or opening a selection from the wine cellar. You could stay out and watch the stars, or head inside to the media room.

The villa’s bright, airy interiors blur the line between indoors and out. Sleek white furniture on the covered patio matches the crisp white upholstery on the indoor sofa, and the two spaces can be completely opened to each other via fold-away glass walls. The dining area gets a subtly tropical hit of pattern from blue and white chairs, and the fully equipped kitchen is both minimalist and warm thanks to flat-fronted wood cabinets.

Bastide may be a vacation rental, but its bedrooms feel like suites at a boutique hotel. Each has a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, two have al-fresco showers and one opens to a private terrace. Built-in headboards, vaulted ceilings, large windows and crisp white bedding give the rooms clean lines and a soothing feel, and the spacious bathrooms invite you to linger in spa-worthy wood-floored showers.

During your holiday, plan to spend at least one day at the beach, whether you make the 15-minute walk to Shell Beach or the 3.4 km drive to St. Jean Beach. Spend an afternoon or evening exploring Gustavia, a 5-minute drive from the villa and a great spot for window shopping or dining out. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 2.6 km drive from Bastide to the island’s Gustaf III Airport.

Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This exquisite St. Barts villa is situated near the St. Jean quartier of Saint Barthelemy, about two minutes on foot from Nikki Beach, and enjoys panoramic views of the St. Jean Bay and Caribbean Sea. Minimalist in design, the villa exudes and accentuates the natural beauty St. Barts, with superb alfresco living spaces, cool and spacious interiors, and four king bedroom suites.

Nestled on a hilltop among lush tropical flora, the villa's terrace sets the stage for open-air relaxation and entertainment. Play in the infinite swimming pool overlooking expansive vistas, and soak in the rays on elegant loungers and sunbeds. Sip cocktails in the comfy lounge, cooled by the gentle shade of the wood pergola. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, rinse off in the alfresco shower and kindle the grill in the ample outdoor kitchen. Linger outside at sunset and at night, savoring the sea breeze.

An open glass wall invites a lovely alfresco ambiance throughout the open-concept interior. Prepare delicious meals in the fully equipped kitchen, gathering around the rustic wood dinning table for eight, and sip digestifs in the sumptuous, sea-view lounge. Vaulted wood ceilings with exposed beams, hanging fans, and lovely lamps create an exquisite island ambiance.

The bedrooms are wonderfully outfitted to provide couples and individuals with serene and cozy sanctuaries. Each features a king bed, ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet, desk, safe, and high-end media amenities. Smooth stone floors, elegant furnishings, and sea and garden views cast a dreamy spell over your downtime hours.

Varuna enjoys a fabulous balance of seclusion and convenience. Walk about 300 paces to Nikki Beach and less than a kilometer to the beach and nightlife at St. Jean Bay. With the airport only 1.5 kilometers from your door, Varuna is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests or weekend getaways.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Palm is a spectacular luxury villa in Grand Cul de Sac, on the northeast shore of St. Barts. Situated on a hillside overlooking the Caribbean Sea, the villa is within walking distance of Grand Cul de Sac Beach and Marechal Beach. Bathed in exquisite ocean light, the villa enjoys breathtaking views, ample alfresco living areas, and elegant interiors. With two deluxe queen bedrooms, this vacation rental is ideal for small families, two couples, or even single couples enjoying a honeymoon or romantic escape to this jewel of the Caribbean.

Nestled amid lush tropical gardens and exposed stone walls, the villa melds harmoniously with its precious surroundings. Wide doors open from the terrace to the interior living area, creating a lovely indoor/outdoor space. Enjoy enchanting days bathing in the infinity swimming pool and relaxing on stylish sun loungers or the elegant sunbed. Enjoy alfresco meals in the beautiful dining pavilion.

Indoors, the kitchen is fully equipped with high-end appliances, including a blender and espresso machine, and includes an ample island bar. It shares an open-plan living area with sumptuous lounge furnishings and a large, flat-screen satellite television. A Sonos sound system allows you to play your favorite tunes throughout the home. The large open wall to the pool invites delicious breezes and beautiful views indoors.

Flanking the main living area, the two beautiful bedroom suites offer exquisite settings for private downtime and peaceful nights. Each suite features a queen bed, satellite television, safe, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower. The décor is elegant and serene, with lovely light streaming in through pool-facing windows.

Palm enjoys an ideal balance of seclusion and proximity to some of the finest beaches in the Caribbean. Grand Cul de Sac Beach is just a five-minute walk down the road, while Marechal Beach is nine minutes on foot. Lorient, Baie St.-Jean and Gouverneur Beach are also minutes away by car or bicycle. The dining, nightlife, boutique shops, and picturesque streets of Gustavia are also a short drive. For a true taste of remote paradise, drive to the trailhead of Colombier Beach Trail and hike to its secluded shore.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Conveniently placed between two of Antigua’s most beautiful beaches, Darkwood and Ffryes, this sleek and stylish three-bedroom is the seaside villa of your dreams. With incredible ocean views, lavishly adorned interiors, and quick and easy beach access, Tamarind Hills is one of the island’s most prestigious resorts. From Tamarind Hills location along the coast of Jolly Harbour, you’ll be positioned just minutes from the island’s best restaurants, beachfront bars, golf, and nightlife.

Rich wood tones, creamy white walls, and bright accent pieces come together in this luxurious three-bedroom to create a relaxing, yet elegant space for you and your guests to unwind and enjoy an incredible beach getaway. With numerous windows and openings to the terrace, fresh breeze and natural sunlight are fully immersed into the villa’s open concept interior. On the terrace, you’ll love the well adorned outdoor living areas, swimming pool, sun loungers, and easy beach access.

Tamarind Hill’s kitchen comes fully equipped with state of the art appliances, a coffee machine, dishwasher, and there’s a barbecue on the terrace. There are formal and alfresco dining areas, both with seating for four. Inside, the villa is outfitted with Wi-Fi, cable television, and air conditioning. And, during your stay, you’ll have a parking space, twenty-four-hour security, and housekeeping every other day.

After you’ve spent some time on the beach, take a trip into town and visit the Jolly Harbour Marina area for dinner. Sheer Rocks is one of the island’s highest-rated restaurants, located south of Tamarind Hills, just a short walk along the beach. If you’d prefer something more laid-back, Dennis’s Bar has a suckling pig roast every Sunday or stop in on Friday for a beachfront barbecue. If you’d like to explore some of the island’s historical sites, the English Harbour, a half-hour drive from home, is where you’ll find Fort George, Nelson’s Dockyard, and the Lookout party, every Sunday Night, at Shirley Heights.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find your Caribbean bliss—whether it’s wind sports or relaxing on the sand—at Beach Enclave Long Bay Villa 1. Set on the shores of top-rated Long Bay Beach, this oceanfront vacation rental offers easy access to the famously soft sands and warm turquoise waters of Turks and Caicos. Its contemporary architecture and six bedrooms can welcome up to twelve friends or family members in modern luxury.

Your holiday at Beach Enclave includes daily continental breakfast and the services of a property manager, concierge, housekeeper and butler. Join group yoga sessions or ask the community’s recreation staff about activities, or simply relax with the help of the villa’s private infinity pool and shaded outdoor living and dining areas, which also feature a barbecue.

Thanks to thoughtful design by SWA Architects, you’ll glimpse the ocean even before you enter Long Bay Villa 1. The open-concept great room has glass walls on two sides for panoramic views of both lush tropical gardens and the sandy beach. Natural textures, pared-down pieces and shades of blue lend a casual, beachy vibe to the living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen.

The villa has five bedrooms with king beds, including one in the guest house, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and several have honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as furnished private balconies accessed by slide-away glass walls or dreamy al-fresco showers. The bedrooms also have air conditioning for the warmest tropical nights.

Blessed with calm waters and steady breezes, Long Bay Beach is popular with families and wind-sport enthusiasts alike—and the villa sits on a stretch that’s 520 feet long and 75 feet wide. If you’d like to explore more of the island, the villa is just a short drive from famed Grace Bay Beach, shopping and dining along Grace Bay, and the pristine waters of Princess Alexandra National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This elegant beach house sits adjacent to Hawksbill Estate in the fabulous Turks and Caicos. This two-bedroom vacation rental offers a private kitchen and living space, making it a perfect choice for a couples’ retreat, a family holiday, a special event like a wedding or a tropical honeymoon. Just walking distance from the championship 18 holes at the Provo Golf Club, make it one to remember at this oceanfront property right on the bright sands of Grace Bay!

Have a splash in the refreshing waters of the swimming pool just paces from the white sands and turquoise of the sea. With plenty of sun loungers and a lovely alfresco dining set and lounge, this Beach House has got you covered for fun in the sun.

The interiors of the Beach House at Hawksbill are spacious and luminous. Take a little break from the sun in the comfortable living area. The open plan space also includes a stylish formal dining area as well as a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Other perks include an ice maker, cable television, air conditioning and Wi-Fi. Your reservation includes housekeeping.

The two immaculate bedrooms at this non-smoking villa accommodate up to four guests. Both bedrooms include king size beds, televisions, ceiling fans, balconies and en-suite bathrooms with rain showers and his-and-hers vanities. The master suite also provides a bidet. Fine linens and accoutrements provide soothing nights of rest with nothing but the gentle lapping of ocean waves as your soundtrack.

In 2015, Grace Bay was awarded TripAdvisor’s coveted ‘Traveler’s Choice’ award for the top quality of its soft sands and clear waters. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling, scuba diving and golf. Or try a scooter tour for a change of pace, possibly the best way to see a sunny island that’s only a few miles across. Nature lovers should be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas. Live it up with Luxury Retreats!

listing.listing_description:
Discretely located directly on the silky-fine sands of one of the world's best beaches, Coral House is a stunning beachfront villa that marries the essence of the Caribbean with extreme luxury. Inspired in equal measure by the needs of an active, growing family as well as an acute eye for design, Coral House is 12,000 square feet of unpretentious splendor, sophistication and seclusion.

Coral House is an architectural masterpiece, influenced by the work of legendary theatrical designer, Oliver Messel and recalling the 18th century tradition of island plantation estates. It exudes the charm and character of the Turks and Caicos.

The floor plan gracefully integrates indoor and outdoor spaces permitting simple yet sophisticated living. The boundaries between the natural and man-made worlds fade as one room flows into another providing cozy, comfortable nooks as well as formal areas to entertain and enjoy the ambiance. The attention paid to every detail doesn't stop with the furnishings. Here, days unfold with restorative walks on miles of pristine beach, al fresco yoga, rejuvenating plunges into the pool or soothing swims in the warm clear waters of the bay. The sand and sea provide ample opportunities for fun and relaxation with world-renowned dining, fishing and water sports at your doorstep.

Coral House provides first-class, personalized services and privacy in a spectacular setting enabling you and those you love to experience a unique and unforgettable Caribbean holiday.

Read our insider guide to Coral House in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2014/07/turks-caicos-vacation-diary/)

listing.listing_description:
South Caicos’ premier luxury resort, Sailrock, is located right on the sandy coast line of the Caribbean Sea. In fact, beach access is as easy as walking out your front door. You’ll also find fine dining, a spa, and plenty of island activities to experience at Sailrock. They’ve got everything you’ll need, and more, to create an unforgettable Caribbean vacation.

Sailrock’s two bedroom suite is perfect for a romantic honeymoon or small family vacation. The main living area is spacious, with vaulted ceilings and wide openings to the fresh ocean air. Simplistic design and decor puts the focus on the natural surroundings, while wooden accents add warmth and an indoor connection to the environment. The kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances. The dining area has a beautifully rustic wooden table with space for four. And, the master bedroom features a king sized bed and it’s own private terrace with outdoor furniture.

Let’s face it, you’re probably never going to leave the beach. But if you do, you’ll love the private oasis that is Sailrock’s terrace. Surrounding the swimming pool you’ll enjoy lounge chairs, sun beds, outdoor living areas, and alfresco dining. Inside, air conditioning and ceiling fans will help keep you cool and circulate that fresh ocean breeze. In the kitchen there’s a coffee and espresso machine, wine fridge, and a breakfast bar. And, included with the rental you’ll receive airport transfer, a full American breakfast, and housekeeping.

Sailrock’s concierge can set you up with the experience of a lifetime. Kayaking, paddle boarding, fishing, boating, diving, and bike tours are all exciting ways to enjoy the island’s natural features and wildlife. If you’d like a trip in to the city, South Caicos downtown is about five kilometres from Sailrock. It’s home to some of the best beachfront bars and seafood restaurants in all of Turks and Caicos.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This beautiful five-bedroom home was designed with the elegance of a classic West Indies plantation manor and offers unforgettable views of pristine Atlantic waters. Located on the Leeward side of Providenciales, the 9000 sq ft property has direct access to a 600 ft stretch of white sandy beach. Whether visiting for a romantic getaway or to escape the real world with your family, look no further than Amazing Grace.

Beautifully landscaped gardens surround the picturesque home, allowing you to feel truly ensconced in the island’s beauty. Spend tranquil days swimming or kayaking off your 100 ft dock or bask under the island sun from the pool terrace. Designer deck furniture is at your disposal, while a refreshing dip in the 50 ft pool will always hit the spot. At dusk you’ll be treated to memorable sunsets, and as darkness sets in, the property’s custom lighting system casts a magical glow on the gardens. Enjoy a starlight supper around the al fresco dining table.

Arched French doors surround the home, allowing light and fresh breezes to coast inside. Discover true comfort among the soft contemporary furnishings, while natural infusions of exposed beams and dark wood remind you of your tropical setting. The spacious living room and elegant dining room both look out to the ocean. Catch up on your favorite shows in the media room, equipped with a high-end home theater system. Natural stone surfaces and custom wood cabinets make the chef’s kitchen a pleasure to create in. A private chef, butler and housekeeper will endeavor to make your stay as easy as possible.

Amazing Grace’s five stunning bedrooms capture the warmth and spirit of Turks and Caicos. The immense master suite opens on two sides to the upper veranda. Its his-and-hers en-suite houses dual-vanities and showers that open to the outdoors. The remaining guests bedrooms also feature their own well-appointed en-suites, air conditioning and beautiful views. Two of the guest bedrooms contain Queen beds while the remaining two hold Twin beds.

Providenciales is home to several of the worlds most beautiful beaches, and there’s time to explore them all. Horseback riding along the white sands will appeal to those on a romantic escape, while friends and families will love exploring the reef-protected waters of the Princess Alexandra National Park. But all should visit the lively streets of Grace Bay, where you’ll discover shops, restaurants and vibrant nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The Caribbean charm is strong at this shingle-sided, French-doored, cottage-style Saint Barthélemy retreat. Its bright red roof matches the ones just down the hill in Gustavia, its wraparound veranda is strung with a hammock, and its high-ceilinged rooms are airy and chic.

Watch yachts ply the island’s waters from a lounger on the sun-kissed deck by the heated swimming pool or take a nap in the hammock in the shade of the veranda. Hedges, palms, and potted plants make the sitting and dining areas on the veranda feel hidden away in the gardens—even though they have views over the town and coast—and a gas barbecue makes light work of dinner. 

Follow the sets of French doors from the veranda to an open-concept great room with a living area, dining table for 8, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a colorful backsplash. The honeymoon-worthy master suite has its own kitchenette and entrance, perfect for couples wanting a little more privacy. 

It’s a 10-minute walk from the villa to Shell Beach, where you can marvel over the seashells washed ashore and watch the sunset. For people-watching and water sports, make the 8-minute drive to St. Jean Beach. Beachy bars and some of the Caribbean’s best dining in Gustavia are a short drive away. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Tucked away amongst lush tropical gardens, this modern beach house in George Town exists in the convenience of a resort, yet prides itself on privacy. Layout a beach towel on the spacious lawn and work on your tan. Then, follow mature palms and fragrant flowers on the short trail leading to 7-Mile Beach, one of Trip Advisor's "Best Beaches in the Caribbean."

Playful pastels and warm wood accents guide you through Seafire's eclectic interior. Just inside the doorway to the gardens, you'll love relaxing with a good book in the orange swing-chair, stretching out on the plush sofa, or dining with friends in the open concept main room. Beyond, a well-organized kitchen doesn't take up much space, but it has everything you'll need.

Rather dine out? Seafire's Coccoloba Restaurant is perfect for beachfront cocktails and Mexican street tacos. For dinner, take that special someone to Avecita for Spanish tapas. Just hop on a bicycle, and you're there in minutes. If you want to burn off some of those calories, hit the beach fitness center for a yoga, boxfit, or paddleboarding class. And, the kids will love Seafire's programs too.

Within a few minute's drive, you could shoot a round at North Sound Golf Club, take the kids to Kittiwake Shipwreck, or go shopping in Camana Bay. If you feel like making new friends, swim with the turtles at Cayman Turtle Center, or watch Crocodiles and Sharks have lunch at the feeding shows. At night, head to Backroom for some high-end rum and a cigar in their old-school speakeasy atmosphere.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that Tryall Club's main beach will undergo renovations from May to November 2019 and will not be accessible. You are welcome to visit the quiet beach next to it. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Jubilation is a six-bedroom, compound-style vacation villa that acts more like a mini-resort within the prestigious Tryall Club. Perfect for a special event, this property has more than ample hosting space that flows from the gorgeous interior to the luxurious terrace without any obstruction. With four separate bedrooms and two-masters on the second floor, everyone will have the privacy they desire. And, there's plenty to keep you and your guests busy with golf, tennis, private beachfront and more within the resort.

Surrounded by beautifully manicured greenery, this spacious villa is seamlessly integrated into the gorgeous Jamaican environment. Open-Concept interior design and a delightfully blurry line between inside and out give Jubilation a breezy, tranquil atmosphere, and unifies the entire property as one large hosting space. The interior decor is ultra-luxurious, with colonial style furniture, vaulted exposed-wood ceilings, and elaborate chandeliers. Thoughtful crafting went into every intricate detail of Jubilation, making an unforgettable home for an unforgettable vacation.

Life at the Tryall Club is made even easier for you with a friendly staff consisting of a housekeeper, butler, laundress, and private chef. With their help, you can focus all your energy on enjoying Jamaica. Start with your private terrace, where you'll find a saltwater swimming pool, wet bar, billiard table, living spaces, and alfresco dining. You'll also find two golf carts; they will help you navigate your way to Tryall's private beach, tennis courts, golf course, fitness center, and restaurants.

After you've explored Tryall's amenity-rich estate and you're ready to see the rest of Jamaica, start with Montego Bay. Just twenty-kilometers from home, you'll find amazing public beaches, duty-free shopping, delicious Jamaican cuisine, and a vibrant nightlife scene in Montego Bay. And, if you're traveling with kids, Kool Runnings Waterpark and Aqua Sol Theme park make for exciting day trips.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details

Enjoy the amenities of a boutique hotel in the comfort of a private estate at Sugar Bay on Discovery Bay. Inspired by traditional Jamaican luxury villas, this recently built five-bedroom property elevates Caribbean style in a gorgeous beachfront setting. A full staff ensures that you and up to ten friends or family members have a memorable stay.

The villa’s name could easily apply to the soft white sands of its private beach, which gently slopes into warm turquoise waters. Take the kayak and snorkeling equipment out to explore the bay, or go for a lazy float or soak in the swimming pool or hot tub. Practice your volleys on the tennis court and, in the evenings, settle in around the satellite television, wet bar or Wi-Fi. Your holiday at Sugar Bay also includes the services of a cook, butler and housekeeper.

A sweeping staircase, wrought-iron chandelier and lofty ceilings set the tone for the villa’s interiors, which are refined yet comfortable. Choose from several sitting and dining areas for everything from a morning coffee to pre-dinner cocktails to post-prandial card games. While cook service is included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen.

Sugar Bay has two bedrooms with king beds—including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a jetted tub and its own balcony—one bedroom with a queen bed, one bedroom with two double beds and one bedroom with two twin beds (which can be combined to form one king bed if desired). All five bedrooms at this vacation rental have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

From the villa’s location on picturesque Discovery Bay, it’s a 10-minute drive to the nearest golf course, a 34.4 km drive to the closest shops and a 63.9 km trip to the airport. In addition to the private beach in front of the villa, there are several other beaches in the area. If you’d like to learn more about the history of Discovery Bay, it’s well worth a visit to the open-air museum at Columbus Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Kailani is an extraordinary, five-bedroom villa in the St. James area of Barbados, about ten minutes from Holetown. Perched at a serene remove along a coastal ridge near the western shore, the home enjoys panoramic sunset views of the Caribbean Sea from its ample pool terrace, interior great room, and master bedroom suite. Minutes from world-class beaches, watersports, and golf courses, this vacation rental is an ideal choice for families and groups of friends seeking privacy and a unique experience of tropical paradise.

The villa is wonderfully positioned and designed such that the blue Caribbean sea and sky are visible through the front entrance as your arrive. The vista seems to bloom as you enter the home, widening in the expansive veranda and reaching 180 degrees from the half-moon swimming pool. Multiple lounge and dining areas invite you to dreamy hours in the Barbadian light, while a covered hot tub welcomes soothing soaks in the sea-kissed breeze.

The centerpiece of the home is its fabulous veranda, pairing a twelve-person dining table with a vaulted salon—both with expansive views of the horizon. The interior kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, while the outdoor kitchen features a large grill, stove, and fridge. The villa also features a media lounge for cozy movie nights, as well as a home office and well-equipped gym.

The main house includes four spacious bedrooms, each with king bed, walk-in closet, air conditioning, and ensuite bathroom. The master suite enjoys a corner location with doors opening to the veranda, pool, and ocean views. A separate cottage also includes a king bed and ensuite bathroom, while enjoying its own lounge and kitchenette. Like the rest of the villa, the bedrooms offer an understated yet elegant ambiance, with rich wood accents complementing fresh white wall finishes that grow luminous in the island light.

The villa is just ten minutes from Holetown and an easy drive to Sandy Lane Beach, Mullins Beach, and Gibbs Beach. Golfers are minutes from Green Monkey Golf Course at Sandy Lane as well as Royal Westmoreland. Grantley Adams International Airport is less than fourteen kilometers away, making Kailani a convenient choice for destination wedding guests or hassle-free family escapes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Seriously stunning views of turquoise sea and verdant hillsides get a playful boost from squashy purple sun beds at this sleekly styled modern home overlooking St. Martin’s Baie Rouge Beach. Rooms clad in creamy travertine and dark wood are a neutral frame for the vistas pouring in through glass walls. Join honeymooners snorkeling off Plum Bay Beach on the French side, a 5-minute drive away.

Your holiday begins with an airport transfer to the villa, where tropical gardens, a tranquil courtyard, and a welcome basket are waiting to meet you. Find loungers in the sun and shade around the infinity pool, as well as a covered al-fresco dining area and a barbecue. Grown-ups will adore the Bali-inspired stone tub and massage table, while kids will appreciate the volleyball and bocce courts. There’s also a home theater, games room, mini-bar, and Wi-Fi inside, and the villa is fully staffed if booked to capacity.

This vacation rental puts an Asian spin on Caribbean luxury, with an open-concept great room filled with teak accents and rattan furniture to complement the sea views. Travertine floors and a vaulted ceiling connect the living area, dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with an indoor breakfast bar and a pass-through to an outdoor bar.

There are three bedrooms with king beds: two with their own honeymoon-suite-worthy al-fresco showers, and one on a lower level with a kitchenette and living area that’s ideal for in-laws or extended family. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, and all five bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms.

A stay in the Terres Basses area means you’re a 10-minute drive or less from three quiet beaches and Marigot, the capital of the island’s French side. Choose Plum Bay Beach for snorkeling or surfing, Baie Rouge for swimming in relatively calm waters that lap at pale pink sand, and Long Bay Beach for quiet sunbathing—and the occasional celeb spotting.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa del Sol is a dream-like villa in the exclusive Leeward District of Providenciales, a beautiful gem of an island in Turks and Caicos. With stunning ocean views and exquisite design combining contemporary comforts with harmonious elegance, this three-bedroom vacation rental is the perfect private paradise for friends, families, and destination wedding guests seeking privacy in the heart of paradise.

Savor long afternoons swimming in the cool swimming pool, bathing on sung loungers, and dozing in the heavenly hammock strung between beach-rooted palms. For lunch, gather around the alfresco dining table with lovely cushioned wicker chairs, and sip cocktails in the evening in the covered lounge as the cooler breezes blow.

Wall-length glass doors open from the pool terrace into the villa's open-plan, ocean-view interior. Sumptuous sofas face the mounted flat screen television, ideal for nighttime viewing, while the circular table by the window is perfect for morning coffee or latenight games. The formal dining table of exquisite wood sits beneath a lovely vaulted wooden ceiling and hanging fan. Beside it, the fully equipped kitchen includes a large breakfast bar for four. The décor is exquisite throughout, combining contemporary chic with Caribbean elegance rooted in earth and sea.

The villa's three bedrooms include a master suite with king bed, ocean-view glass doors opening to the terrace, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and jetted tub. There is also a bedroom with a queen bed and one with two twin size beds (which can be converted into a king); both have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers. All of the bedrooms include ceiling fans, televisions, and cozy bedding, perfect for afternoon lazing or nights of deep sleep to the ocean's rhythms.

On the island paradise that is Providenciales, you never have to travel far to taste its riches. You're within a short drive of Long Bay Beach, Sunset Beach, and the Coral Garden. For exceptionally pristine beaches and natural beauty, don't miss Princess Alexandra National Park.
