listing.listing_description:
Making the most of its hillside perch, this luxurious four bedroom features incredible ocean views, as well as a private stone walkway that leads down to the sandy shores of Peter Bay Beach. Located on the North shore of St. John, an island mostly protected from development by the Virgin Islands National Park, 2B at Peter Bay is the secluded beach vacation of your dreams. Within a short drive, you’ll have access to several other beach areas, hiking trails, water sports activities, and the Island’s two main towns, Coral Bay and Cruz Bay.

Stately archways lead you through 2B’s open-air estate, bouncing from inside to out, completely barrier-free, the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight of the Caribbean flow freely throughout. While you’re inside, you’ll have no trouble keeping an eye on the beautiful turquoise Sea, in fact, it’s quite easy to capture ocean views from nearly every inch of this gorgeous beach house. Decorated with intricate stonework, terracotta flooring tiles, and designer furniture, 2B shows off the merging of nature and luxury.

2B at Peter Bay features four en-suite bedrooms, all with air conditioning and balconies. There’s formal and alfresco dining, with seating for eight. On the terrace, you’ll love the ocean view, swimming pool, hot tub, and scenic outdoor living spaces. Back inside, 2B is equipped with a state of the art kitchen, Wi-Fi, satellite television, and more.

The best way to explore St. John’s beautiful turquoise water and intricate coral reef system is by kayak, or for an even closer look, scuba diving or snorkeling. Henley Cay Adventure Tours is a great place for tourists of any skill level to get outfitted with the gear and expertise that they’ll need to enjoy the beautiful Caribbean Sea. If you’d prefer to travel by land, there are numerous hiking trails through the park that wind through lush jungle, petroglyphs, ruined sugar mills, and secluded beaches. If it’s the city life you crave, visit Cruz Bay for beachfront cocktails and delicious local cuisine.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Ixfalia is an amazing four-bedroom villa located on the heights of Saint Jean on the fabulous Caribbean island of St. Barts. This stunning vacation rental is located just a quick drive from town and a number of beaches as well as stylish boutiques and restaurants. With a beautiful view of the oceanfront and the white sands of the bay, you will be perfectly poised for the ultimate holiday in the sun!

Ixfalia offers the amenities usually found at a boutique resort, but within the private space of a villa. Your family and friends will love the extra-long infinity swimming pool that more or less runs the entire length of the deck. You will also find a lovely alfresco dining area and plenty of lounging options including sun beds. The perks inside include an ice maker, espresso machine, satellite television, a sound system, Apple TV and Wi-Fi. There’s also an exercise room so you can stay on top of your workouts while away. Your reservation includes housekeeping.

The overall decorative theme of Ixfalia could be described as a beachside dreamscape. With bright comfortable furnishings alongside copious wooden accents including organically shaped furnishings, sculptures, driftwood and curios, each space within this pristine residence epitomizes the idea of barefoot sophistication. High vaulted ceilings keep it cool inside!

Four immaculate bedrooms host up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. Each bedroom includes an en-suite bathroom, queen size bed, dual vanity, television and air conditioning. Three suites are located in the guest house, while the stand-alone master suite makes a great bet for the honeymooning couple. The villa also makes an easy and breezy setting for a wedding, anniversary or birthday.

St. Barts has earned its reputation for being luxurious and exclusive. The beaches are secluded, the water is warm and the landscape filled with glorious hills and ravines. With a distinct French influence, the island is sophisticated, yet laid back. In Gustavia, St. Barts’ tiny and relaxed capital city, you will discover red roofed buildings that pop through the lush tropical landscape, and all the historical sites can be seen over a the course of a leisurely day. Get the holiday you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Grace Too is a family estate directly on the beach in the heart of Grace Bay, Providenciales, featuring three homes over two buildings: The Beach House, The Quarterdeck and The Cottage, offering many room configurations. This large, contemporary, completely renovated (completed December 2016) family estate can accommodate up to 16 guests over three homes, making it the quintessential extended family vacation destination. Grace Too, with 100 feet of beach front access to renowned Grace Bay beach’s 11 km of white, sugar-fine sand, is steps from multiple restaurants in either direction. The large, beachfront pool is surrounded by pristine white loungers, sofas, Adirondacks, and beautiful landscaping designed to provide privacy while allowing unobstructed views of the stunning turquoise ocean. The outdoor pool BBQ and shower round out this vacation-essential space. Best of all, from Grace Too’s beachfront, you can explore amazing snorkeling at the national-park-protected Bight Reef. In total, Grace Too has six elegantly-appointed bedrooms, a seventh picture-perfect twin bedroom-loft and one comfortable sofa bed, 5.5 bathrooms, three living rooms, three kitchens, an outdoor kitchen, three indoor dining areas, three outdoor dining areas, and hundreds of feet of outdoor veranda space, ensuring every guest has the comfort and privacy they deserve as well as space to mix and mingle while on their once-in-a-lifetime Caribbean holiday.

listing.listing_description:
Welcome to Atlantis, a Caribbean villa with a distinct modern flair. Atlantis sits on top of a hill overlooking some of the best views in Saint Lucia. The sloping parkland around the villa is beautifully manicured, with many well established trees and tropical shrubs, low-walled planters and a carefully tended kitchen garden springing into bounty after years of green-fingered care.

The curved driveway leads to a generous parking area, and the impressive but welcoming entrance, with its elegant coral stone staircase framed by an arched portico and stately double doors. The single storey villa’s walls are built from natural local stone, and the arch motif is repeated throughout the exterior and interior, including the stylish but eminently functional solid wood windows whose shape exactly echo the architectural detail. Atlantis is a unique property in many ways, and the villa’s recent clever, high end upgrade has resulted in a crisp, modern look with an historic, old Caribbean feel.

Step inside, and the 8000 square foot home beckons in all directions. The immediate centre of attention is the indoor gated courtyard, with its soothing water feature and deep koi pond open to the blue sky above, a surprisingly Italianate feature in this Saint Lucian family home, throwing light and air throughout the adjacent great room and casual living area.

The living space has two areas: the formal lounge looks onto the villa’s capacious wrap-around verandah and pool deck, through tall, wide French windows which echo the arched style of the entrance. The interior walls are beautiful, textural mixture of coral stone and natural local stone, its silvery grey tones contrasting with the high vaulted, dark stained ceiling, an original feature which was hand-crafted from beautifully finished natural wood. A casual-style television den lies to the right off the main living space, and the kitchen and formal dining room open up to the left.

From crisp white cabinetry and modern fixtures to granite countertops and state of the art appliances, the family kitchen at Atlantis is spacious enough for casual dining, and impressively appointed for entertaining. It leads to the formal dining room, with its solid wood, refectory style table and seating room for eight to twelve.

Through every arched window of Atlantis there is a breathtaking panorama, and a step through any one of the French windows reveals some of the villa’s extensive views. The outdoor living area is a seamless extension of indoors, with comfortable areas for relaxing and dining, and access to the 60’ infinity pool with its bird’s eye vantage of the hills and golf course below. To the west, the panorama extends from Mount Pimard and Rodney Bay to Pigeon Island, with Martinique sometimes visible on the horizon. To the east, the wraparound verandah peeks towards the Atlantic off Cas En Bas Bay: all around the property, balmy breezes and shady corners keep the indoor and outdoor spaces cool all day long.

Several guest bedrooms are laid out in an interlocking floor plan off the beautiful indoor/outdoor atrium off the courtyard. Cathedral ceilings and lots of arched windows ensure every bedroom is bright and airy. There are 5 bedrooms in total, the master is located to the left of the courtyard and has a queen size bed and an ensuite bathroom. Two more bedrooms, one with a queen bed and another with two double beds share a large Jack and Jill bathroom. To the left of this bedroom is another queen bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and between the two is a cosy television room, complete with DVD and a small movie selection. The last of the 5 bedrooms has a queen bed and its own bathroom which is located across the hallway.

Atlantis is a unique and impressive property, sprawling and spacious, but with a warm and welcoming family ambiance, and a layout designed for entertaining. Perched on top of its hilltop vantage point, secluded yet private Atlantis boasts a 10 minute drive to most amenities and attractions of Rodney Bay.

listing.listing_description:
Spot tropical birds and fish around Mangrove Cay from the waterfront Seagrace. This modern Caribbean residence has a resort-worthy pool and lounge area set at the edge of the canal in the Leeward Settlement. When you’ve had enough napping in the Turks and Caicos sunshine, take the kayaks or paddleboard out to explore nearby cays or pedal the bicycles to the white sands of famed Grace Bay Beach.

 

Let the villa’s housekeeper take care of the details while you savor the warm weather from the pool and outdoor living and dining areas, or prep just-caught seafood on the barbecue. After sunset, linger outside around the firepit or gather inside the vacation rental around the smart TV, put a favorite album on the Sonos sound system or share holiday snaps over Wi-Fi.

 

There’s plenty of room for the whole family—or your group of friends—to catch up in the open-concept great room, which has a spacious sitting area, a dining table for 8 and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Three sets of sliding glass doors lead to the outdoor living areas and frame views of the canal.

 

Seagrace has 3 bedrooms with king beds: two with private en-suite bathrooms, including the master suite, and one that shares access to a hall bathroom. This luxury residence also has one bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, and one bedroom with two twin beds that shares the hall bathroom with the king bedroom.

 

Kayaks, a paddleboard and bicycles give you the luxury of exploring the area at your leisure. Paddle out to Mangrove Cay to spot wildlife or to Little Water Cay to meet some of its resident rock iguanas. Cycle to Grace Bay Beach to put your toes in its sugar-like sand and turquoise water or relive your honeymoon over dinner at a restaurant along its shores.

listing.listing_description:
A hand-painted sign hangs over a table on Villa Saline Reef’s immense terrace that reads, “Relax! It doesn’t get much better than this!” Truer words have never been written: luxury, quiet seclusion, tasteful design and spectacular views guarantee this epithet. Located at the northernmost tip of Saline Point in the exclusive Cap Estate, prepare for an escape that will stay with you forever.

Bright bougainvillea and lush green tropical flora pepper a large tiled terrace where you’ll find chaises in both sunny and shady spots. Wherever you choose to relax, the gorgeous split-level pool, with waterfall feature, will eventually beckon you. Swim in the lower half or sit in the upper half and enjoy views of Pigeon Island and across the Caribbean straights to Martinique. The dining and grill deck provides an uninterrupted sunset view to enjoy while savoring an al fresco feast.

Saline Reef is decorated throughout with soft and handmade furnishings imported from England. The central living room is bright and airy, courtesy of wide French doors, large bay windows and fans hanging from the high, vaulted ceiling. Upstair, a professionally-appointed kitchen gives you everything you need to prepare a memorable meal for your guests. Enjoy it from the elegant dining table that seats 6.

The villa sleeps 6 people in 3 bedrooms, including 2 Master bedrooms, one above the other. Each Master bedroom has a private deck, including a romantic crow’s nest seating area for 2, overlooking the sea. All rooms contain a Queen size bed, walk-in closet, fine linens and bathrobes, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

Saline Reef is only 3.8 km from the Rodney Bay area, the hub of St. Lucia’s cultural life. In the town of Gros Islet you’ll find upscale shopping, fine dining and a bustling marina where you can rent sailboats. You’re walking distance from an 18-hole golf course and several beaches ideal for swimming or snorkeling. Boat trips can be arranged to the famous Pitons and Sulphur Springs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

Please note that for an additional cost, a one-bedroom guest cottage can be made available. For more details, please contact a Villa Specialist.

This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Coconut Walk is an exquisite, beachfront villa on Seven Mile Beach in Grand Cayman. With spectacular views of the Caribbean Sea and ample space for fun and relaxation, this seven-bedroom vacation rental combines a breathtaking, bygone elegance with modern luxury amenities, providing the perfect sanctuary and playground for your Cayman Islands escape. Accommodations for fourteen and benefits from Silver Thatch Guest Services make it an excellent choice for families or large groups of friends seeking a stylish and private alternative to a hotel or resort.

The gated estate's lush gardens and private beach create a sense of dreamy seclusion just steps from the sea. The swimming pool is nestled like an emerald lagoon between the villa and sand, bordered by a terrace with sun loungers. More loungers await you on the beach, as well as a hammock strung between palms. Relish long days in the Caribbean sun as the kids enjoy the swing-set and basketball court. In the evening, retire to the poolside pavilion for cocktails in the cozy lounge and a delicious meal at the alfresco table.

From the terrace, step into the spectacular Great Room, with its two-story wall of ocean-view windows and gorgeously elegant décor. Savor evenings together in the sumptuous living room accompanied by tunes from the baby grand piano, then congregate for memorable feasts in the lovely dining room (which opens directly to the alfresco dining table in the pavilion). The kitchen is fully equipped and includes a breakfast bar and doors to the outdoor garden. A ground-floor game room, with billiard and foosball tables as well as a lovely bar, opens to the pool terrace. Two cozy media lounges are ideal for nighttime entertainment.

The villa's main house features seven bedrooms—a master bedroom with California king bed, four rooms with king beds, one with two queens, and one with two doubles. Sleeping up to fourteen people, the villa accommodates destination wedding guests and family reunions. The master bedroom features a private balcony with spectacular ocean views.

Coconut Walk is wonderfully situated near West Bay on Grand Cayman's northwest peninsula. North Sound Golf Club and George Town are a short drive away, as is the Cayman Turtle Center. Complimentary transfer service is provided to Owen Roberts International, twenty minutes away.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _
